chart.title: Per capita CO₂ emissions from deforestation for food production
chart.subtitle: Tonnes of CO₂ emissions per person linked to deforestation for food production – it is trade-adjusted, to reflect the carbon footprint of diets within a given country. Based on the annual average over the period from 2010 to 2014.
